description: While various PC games developed by New World Computing, Inc. use AGG files, they are most commonly associated with Heroes of Might and Magic and Heroes of Might and Magic II. The first version of Heroes of Might and Magic debuted in 1995, and the second version debuted in 1996. If you have access to the original games, you can find AGG files in the installation directory of the games.
NOTE: New World Computing, Inc. eventually transferred the rights to the Heroes of Might and Magic franchise to Ubisoft in 2003.
